text: Halftime Heat was a series of professional wrestling shows made by the World Wrestling Federation (later WWE) in 1999, 2000, and 2019. It aired on TV at the same time as the halftime of the Super Bowl. All events featured just one match. ==Events== Event Date City Venue Main Event Halftime Heat (1999) January 31, 2019 Tucson, Arizona Tucson Convention Center Halftime Heat (2000) January 30, 2000 Halftime Heat (2019) February 3, 2019 Orlando, Florida WWE Performance Center Category:Professional wrestling Category:WWE
title: Halftime Heat
